Frequently Asked Questions

We might take a while to reply to your question, in the meantime take a look a our main frenquetly asked questions, you may find the answer to all your questions here!

- If you have just got your Eyelashes done, we advice you to get a infil done every two weeks. In order for you to consider an infil, you should have at least 50% of the your extensions still on.

- If you are unsure about what type of eyelashes is the most suitable for you, feel free to ask and we will hapily advice you on what style is the bet for you!

- If you would like to get your hair refited, we advice our clients to wait at least 4 weeks, so your hair can grow stronger and make the refit easier!

- The hair usually lasts between 12-16 months with good care, therefore you can us it as many times as you wish!

- A desposit is required in order to secure you an appointment, and ocne the treatment is done, we will use your deposit towards the treatment's cost.

- You will have 48hrs notice when re-booking your appointment to ensure your deposit stands.

- We operate at all times of the day as we know our clients can have very busy days/weeks


Not found what you are looking for...

Feel free to contact us through our social media or leave us a message on our Contact page, and we will be more than happy to help you with your enquire.

Our team will in contact you as soon as possible, but keep in mind it may take up to 24 hours, as we are busy working on our bookings.
